text: Pyramide may refer to: * Pyramide, brand name in Japan and Thailand for pyrazinamide, an anti-tuberculosis drug * Pyramide (benzamide), a group of benzamides, one of which is used as a fungicide * Pyramidal tracts, anatomical feature, aggregations of nerve fibres from the spinal cord to the brain, sometimes referred to as "pyramides" * Pyramide (patience), a double-deck solitaire card game * Die Pyramide, a high-rise building in Berlin * La Pyramide a restaurant in Vienne, Isère, France ==See also== * Pyramid (disambiguation)
title: Pyramide
